data.title: Contact Centre Recruitment Nottingham
data.meta_description: About | James Kay Associates | Contact Centre Recruitment Nottingham   | Office Recruitment Nottingham   | Nottingham Recruitment Agency Recruitment agency in Nottingham specialising in Contact Centre, Office and professional recruitment services
data.text:
Our Talent is finding your Talent - We have 15 years of recruitment experience

James Kay Associates is a fresh and exciting boutique Recruitment business specialising in Office, Professional and Technical Recruitment, working with Clients and candidates throughout the UK.

Taking a personal and pragmatic approach we aim to provide the best in class industry expertise, helping you grow your business by finding the best candidates to suit your individual business needs. Whether it's a permanent, temporary, contract or interim position we can ensure you get the "best fit" candidates with the skills, experience and personality profile to integrate into your business.

We aim to create seamless forward-thinking partnerships and can offer bespoke recruitment solutions to fulfil your recruitment needs, whether that is for one or multiple vacancies you can rest assured you will receive the highest customer service experience and results-driven approach to support your business.

So if you want to identify, attract and hire exceptional Talent within your business, then look no further and get in touch.

We aim to provide you with clear and thorough communication along the recruitment journey, understanding the trust you place in ourselves to deliver the right candidates who represent your business and brand.
